properties.name: ignoreComments
properties.description: Controls whether XML comments should be parsed (false) or ignored (true).

properties.name: ignoreProcessingInstructions
properties.description: Controls whether XML preprocessing instructions should be parsed (false) or ignored (true).

properties.name: ignoreWhitespace
properties.description: Controls whether whitespace should be parsed (false) or ignored (true).

properties.name: prettyPrinting
properties.description: When true, XML is pretty-printed when converting to a string.

properties.name: prettyIndent
properties.description: The number of spaces used to indent pretty-printed XML.

methods.name: addNamespace
methods.description: Adds a namespace declaration to the node. Returns the XML object itself.

methods.name: appendChild
methods.description: Appends the given XML to this XML as a child. Returns the XML object itself.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The attribute name to look for.

methods.name: attribute
methods.description: Returns a list containing all attribute elements matching the given name.

methods.name: attributes
methods.description: Returns a list containing all attribute elements.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name or the index of the child element.

methods.name: child
methods.description: Returns a list containing all children of this XML matching the given element name.

methods.name: childIndex
methods.description: Returns a number representing the ordinal position of this XML object within the context of its parent.

methods.name: children
methods.description: Returns an XML object containing all the properties of this XML object in order.

methods.name: comments
methods.description: Returns an XML object containing the properties of this XML object that represent XML comments.

methods.name: contains
methods.description: Checks if this XML object contains the given XML object.

methods.name: copy
methods.description: Creates a copy of this XML object.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the descendant to find.

methods.name: descendants
methods.description: Returns all the XML-valued descendants of this XML object with the given name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The element name. If not supplied, gets all children that are XML elements.

methods.name: elements
methods.description: Returns a list of XML children that are elements with a given name, or all children that are XML elements.

methods.name: hasComplexContent
methods.description: Reports whether this XML object contains complex content.

methods.name: hasSimpleContent
methods.description: Reports whether this XML object contains simple content.

methods.name: inScopeNamespaces
methods.description: Returns an array of

parameters.name: child1
parameters.description: The child to insert the other child after.

methods.name: insertChildAfter
methods.description: Inserts the given child2 after the given child1 in this XML object and returns this XML object.

methods.name: insertChildBefore
methods.description: Inserts the given child2 before the given child1 in this XML object and returns this XML object.

methods.name: length
methods.description: Returns the number of elements contained in an XML list. If this XML object is not a list, returns 1.

methods.name: localName
methods.description: Returns the local name of this XML object.

methods.name: name
methods.description: Returns a QName object containing the URI and the local name of the element.

methods.name: namespace
methods.description: Returns a Namespace object containing the namespace URI of the current element.

methods.name: namespaceDeclarations
methods.description: Returns an array containing all namespace declarations of this XML object.

methods.name: nodeKind
methods.description: Returns the type of this XML object as one of the strings "element", "attribute", "comment", "processing-instruction", or "text".

methods.name: normalize
methods.description: Puts all text nodes in this and all descendant XML objects into a normal form by merging adjacent text nodes and eliminating empty text nodes. Returns this XML object.

methods.name: parent
methods.description: Returns the parent object of this XML object.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the preprocessing instruction to return.

methods.name: processingInstructions
methods.description: Returns a list of preprocessing instructions.

methods.name: prependChild
methods.description: Inserts a given child into this object before its existing XML properties, and returns this XML object.

methods.name: removeNamespace
methods.description: Removes the given namespace from this XML, and returns this XML.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The XML with which to replace the value of the matching property.

methods.name: replace
methods.description: Replaces the value of specified XML properties of this XML object returns this XML object.

parameters.name: value
parameters.description: The new value, which can be a single XML object or an XML list.

methods.name: setChildren
methods.description: Replaces all of the XML-valued properties in this object with a new value, and returns this XML object.

methods.name: setLocalName
methods.description: Replaces the local name of this XML object  with a string constructed from the given name

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Replaces the name of this XML object with the given QName object.

methods.name: setNamespace
methods.description: Sets the namespace for this XML element.

methods.name: text
methods.description: Returns an XML list containing all XML properties of this XML object that represent XML text nodes.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns the string representation of this object.

methods.name: toXMLString
methods.description: Returns an XML-encoded string representation of this XML object.

methods.name: xpath
methods.description: Evaluates the given XPath expression in accordance with the W3C XPath recommendation, using this XML object as the context node.
